WEBSOCKET_URL.description: Must use `wss://` protocol. Optional override for value calculated using BASE_URL

WARN_REQUESTS_PER_SEC.description: Emit warnings if the home controller attempts to send more than X messages to home assistant inside of a second

CRASH_REQUESTS_PER_SEC.description: Socket service will self-terminate the process if this limit is exceeded. This can happen if an accidential infinite recursion is triggered due to bad setup
